mapper.select: select id, over_time, create_id, create_time, create_name, type , case sts when '1' then '启用' else '停用' end as sts from st_applet_over_time where type =#{type} and sts != '3'
mapper.insert: insert into st_applet_over_time (id, over_time, create_id, create_time, create_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{overTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into st_applet_over_time
id,
over_time,
create_id,
create_time,
create_name,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{overTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update st_applet_over_time
over_time = #{overTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
